form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: MEDICAL Examination of Applicants for United States Visas

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/13/2023 PLACE MEDICAL EXAMINATION OF APPLICANTS SOMBAY FOR UNITED STATES VISAS DATE OF EXAMINATION 22.2.89/88308026 s CITY COUNTRY the request of the American Consul attenbern 481 BOMBAY NDIA NAME AGE SEX and ends to RUKMINIBAI PURSHOTTAM TENDILKAR 86 F I certify that on the above date I examined WHO BEARS PASSPORT NO. ISSUED BY ON E 352053 BOMBAY 2.6.88 I examined specifically for evidence of any of the following conditions: CLASS A: DANGEROUS CONTAGIOUS DISEASES: Chancroid Lymphogranuloma venereum Gonorrhea Syphilis, infectious stage Granuloma inguinale Tuberculosis, active Leprosy, infectious MENTAL CONDITIONS: Mental retardation Previous occurrence of one or more Mental defect (mental deficiency) attacks of insanity Narcotic drug addiction Insanity Psychopathic personality Chronic alcoholism Sexual deviation (See proviso, sec. 34.7, USPHS Regs.) X CLASS B: Physical Defect, Disease, or Disability Serious in Degree or Permanent in Nature Amounting to a Substantial Departure from Normal Physical Well-Being. CLASS C: Minor Conditions. (CHECK NUMBER (1) BELOW OR COMPLETE NUMBER (2)) My examination, including the X-ray and other reports below, revealed: (1) No defect, disease, or disability. (2) Defect, disease, or disability, or previous occurrence of one or more attacks of insanity, as follows (give class-A, B, or C-diagnosis, and pertinent details*): CLASS 'B' : Right eye - no vision. Fracture right shaft femur 1986. Ankylosing spondylitis. Walks with a limp. Deafness. The lung fields appear clear. Normal appearances of the diaphragm Chest X-ray report and heart. Dorsal scoliosis noted convex to the right. Dr. M. Tayabali from Dr. KAHN TEST: NEGATIVE NTLV (IIT) ANTIBODIES- Blood serological report LOT DETECTED. DR. (MRS.) F. E. PALIA from Dr. Other special report(s) (when needed) Dr. B. M. Meher-Homil from Dr. SIGNATURE OF MEDICAL TECHNICAL ADVISOR TITLE DATE OF FINAL REPORT Amh hushy MEDICAL EXAMINER 24.2.89 50157-102 *Continue on reverse side if necessary. OPTIONAL FORM 157 (Rev. 5-78) U.S. GOVERNMENT PRINTING OFFICE : 1984 O - 443-720 Dept. of State
